TextView.android:text: Place heels of hand in centre of chest, interlocking fingers
General Aspects of Safe Lifeguarding MCQ (10 Questions)

200m Freestyle in less than 4mins (Start in water with Can Bouy/Rescue Tube and no tumbleturns) 200m Swim Timed. Mark out of 45 from 3mins 15seconds to 4mins = 45marks to 1 mark. (If a candidate's timed swim is outside of 4 minutes, he/she fails the Section B Assessement)
Spinal Injury management in Shallow Water (Splint or Clamp)
Underwater search 25m locate and pick up submerged manikin, exchange at surface for subject and administer deep water resuscitation for 10m
